2067090.name: Coloring Pixels - Sci-Fi Fantasy Vistas Pack
2067090.description:
Sci-Fi & Fantasy Vistas Book

This Sci-Fi & Fantasy Vistas-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The third Vistas book in Coloring Pixels, however, this iteration takes a dive into the Fictional and Fantastical!

Jump into many different vistas from multiple imaginations!

Contents

The Sci-Fi & Fantasy Vistas book unlocks the following images:

  • Dystopian - 90x90
  • Icy Wilderness - 95x97
  • Paradise Found - 100x100
  • A Cat's World - 100x106
  • Wormhole - 129x130
  • Surveillance - 140x160
  • Sailing Turtle - 160x134
  • Solar Flare - 160x144
  • Submerged Ring - 160x144
  • The Valley - 160x161
  • Blue Dragon - 180x148
  • Great Tree - 180x210
  • Lost Treasure - 190x150
  • Lunar Station - 240x129
  • Guardian Whale - 140x160
  • Homesick - 240x160
  • Satellite Overlook - 240x160
  • Harvesting - 240x200
  • Rock Giant - 240x200
  • Asteroid Mining - 266x200
